str2: Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A gift, present. A present; specially, a sacrifice.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An altar (for sacrifice). From a derivative of thusia; a place of sacrifice, i.e. An altar.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: From hagios; to make holy, i.e. purify or consecrate; to venerate.
